title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: OBJ Deadline Drama, Inside Brady/Bucs SB Run, Cooper Rush Game with Matt Mosley, Week 9 Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: OBJ Deadline Drama, Inside Brady/Bucs SB Run, Cooper Rush Game with Matt Mosley, Week 9 Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First Colin's top takes of the trade deadline week that was, including week on OBJ's bad fit in Cleveland (3:00), and the real story behind the Deshaun Watson that never happened (7:00). Then, author Lars Anderson discusses his new book A Season in the Sun about Tom Brady and the Buccaneers' incredible Super Bowl season. They talk about how Bruce Arians almost gave up on the team's playoff hopes (11:00), the ultimate reason that Tom Brady left Bill Belichick (15:00), why the Bucs coaching staff knew they wanted to sign Brady (17:00), how Tom wore down management into signing Antonio Brown (20:00), why Bruce Arians' first meeting with Gronk involved a profanity laced tirade (22:00). Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley and Colin react to the Cowboys beating the Vikings without Dak (29:00), why the win is so historically significant for Dallas (31:00), how Kirk Cousins got exposed (33:00), if it's time to finally give Mike McCarthy credit (37:00). Finally, Then The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if he's sharp or square with his Ravens/Vikings pick (43:00), and what to make of the Packers/Chiefs line with Aaron Rodgers MIA due to COVID and (47:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
